cluster_classes.class_description: Physical and institutional locations central to forensic practice, including where crimes occur and where evidence and findings are presented in legal proceedings.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: crime scene where a crime took place; court where forensic evidence and findings may be presented

members.entity_description: Judicial setting where legal proceedings occur and forensic evidence and findings may be presented.
Location where a crime took place and where forensic evidence is documented, preserved, and collected for analysis.

args.justification: The class groups physical and institutional locations specifically in forensic and legal practice (crime scene, court), so assigning the Class_Group 'Forensic Context & Locations' connects it to the broader forensic-domain context layer.

executed_decisions.justification: The class groups physical and institutional locations specifically in forensic and legal practice (crime scene, court), so assigning the Class_Group 'Forensic Context & Locations' connects it to the broader forensic-domain context layer.
